channel.title: Reborn 614 Deling, FistOfGuthix, Castlewars, Spawn and Pk, Perfect hybriding
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2954/pkmadness.png[/img]
[b]Welcome to Reborn 614! 100+ Online. Spawn and Pk || 24/7 Vps Hosted || Stable with Zero lagg || Webclient! || Perfect 24/7 Pking![/center][/b]
Start playing now at [URL=http://"614reborn.com"]Pkmadness Webclient[/URL] Join the forums at [URL=http://"614reborn.com"]Pkmadness Forums[/URL]
PkMadness has been around for many of years! Some of you may remember the 1st 508 server back almost 4 years ago! But most of you will remember the 562 which was a very successful server with over 100k accounts and 200+ online daily. Sadly I got arrested and got sent to prison for 2 years which made it impossible for me to pay for the VPS and there was nothing Charles could do as everything was in my name but on a brighter note we are back and will be introducing The all new 614 Pking Server!
The 614 will offer a perfect Player Killing environment and will be playable 24/7! It is currently hosted on a VPS server and never goes offline!
[HR][/HR] [SPOILER=Server Features][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Summoning Bank tabs Full Working Curse Prayers Perfect Hybrid Pking Safe And Non Safe Zones Earn Your Cash From Killing Players In Safe PVP Stake People In The Duel Arena Auto Vote rewards! [B]Allot more just Join to find out![/B][/COLOR][/SPOILER] [HR][/HR]
[HR][/HR] [SPOILER=Server Pictures][center][img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/agspec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/dueling-1.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/bgspec.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/sgspec.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/soulsplit.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/zgspec.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/meu.gif[/img] [img]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy227/crezzypkmadness/overload-1.gif[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/wa0qzd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2ppk2fl.gif[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2ymysxy.gif[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/dpjvjd.gif[/img][/center][/SPOILER] [HR][/HR]
This is the best 614 server out there by far and will continue to get even better as time progresses! You need any help running the server please post on our [URL=http://"pkmadness.tk"]forums[/URL] or post on this topic and I will get back to you as soon as possible!
Hope to see you all in-game soon!
